timeRange: Enabled between 19:00 and 7:00 the next day
clipboardServiceNotPublic: This clipboard service is not public, please enter the password to continue connecting.
enterRoomName: Enter any name to create a new room, or enter an existing room. Leaving it blank means using the default global room.
roomVisibility: The content sent in the room is only visible within the room, and the number of saved history records will still be subject to the global settings.
